thread.title: Chiara Lari

author: Chiara Lari
title: Chiara Lari
text: I'm not one to leave reviews but felt I had to after the experience I had with clothes2order. I was slightly unhappy with the print of my sweater and although there was technically nothing wrong with it the team dispatched me a new one for free with the changes I wanted! They were very prompt in replying and very understanding. Amazing customer service and would 100% recommend.
